lead_paragraph: The government on Thursday granted a temporary residence permit to an 8-year-old boy from Ivory Coast whom a woman tried to smuggle into Spain in a suitcase.

headline.print_headline: Spain: Reprieve for Smuggled Boy Who Was Found Inside a Suitcase
headline.main: Spain: Reprieve for Smuggled Boy Who Was Found Inside a Suitcase

snippet: The government on Thursday granted a temporary residence permit to an 8-year-old boy from Ivory Coast whom a woman tried to smuggle into Spain in a suitcase.
